mapper.sql: id, member_id, member_name, state,telephone, cardid, sex, identity_card,canteen_id, is_delete, is_use,leave_name, member_type_id, remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, safetyone, safetytwo, safetythree
mapper.select: select ,CASE sex WHEN FALSE THEN 0 WHEN TRUE THEN 1 END AS sexType from dh_members where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into dh_members (id, member_id, member_name, telephone, cardid, sex, canteen_id, is_delete, is_use, member_type_id, remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, safetyone, safetytwo, safetythree ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{memberTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safetythree,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

id,
member_id,
member_name,
telephone,
cardid,
sex,

mapper.update:
update dh_members
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardid = #{cardid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT},
canteen_id = #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT},
is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT},
member_type_id = #{memberTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
safetyone = #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safetytwo = #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safetythree = #{safetythree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dh_members set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardid = #{cardid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, canteen_id = #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT}, member_type_id = #{memberTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, safetyone = #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safetytwo = #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safetythree = #{safetythree,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mem.* , card.accountbalance AS balance from dh_members mem LEFT JOIN dh_member_card card ON card.cardid = mem.cardid where 1 = 1 AND mem.is_delete = 0 AND mem.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update dh_members set is_delete = 1,cardid = NULL where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mem.*,type.name AS typeName,CASE mem.is_use when 0 then '禁用' when 1 then '正常' end as statusName, CASE mem.sex WHEN 0 THEN '男' WHEN 1 THEN '女'END AS sexName ,card.carduid AS ca_carduid,card.accountbalance AS ca_accountbalance from dh_members mem LEFT JOIN dh_member_type type ON mem.member_type_id = type.id LEFT JOIN dh_member_card card ON card.cardid = mem.cardid where 1 = 1 AND mem.is_delete = 0 AND card.carduid = #{cardUID}
mapper.update: update dh_members set is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id,member_id,cardid from dh_members where telephone=#{phone} and member_name=#{username}
select dc.accountbalance from dh_members dm,dh_member_card dc where dm.member_id=#{memberId} and dm.cardid=dc.cardid
mapper.insert: insert into dh_members (id, member_id, member_name, telephone, cardid, state,sex,identity_card,leave_name, canteen_id, is_delete, is_use, member_type_id, remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT},#{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{canteenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isUse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{memberTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into dh_member_card (carduid, servicetime,accountbalance,isdeleted) values (#{carduid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{servicetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{accountbalance,jdbcType=REAL},#{isdeleted,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update dh_members set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, identity_card = #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leave_name = #{leaveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carduid = #{carduid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
